testimonials.text: I was amazed at how uninteresting this site is, and how little it can do. But I did not have to open Spotify to look for nursery rhymes! I will be returning for sure!
testimonials.name: Iy Am

testimonials.text: I don't even know what I am doing here
testimonials.name: Joe King

testimonials.text: SpotifAPI has really allowed me to see the joy in life again. For a while I wasn't able to see the bright side, but being able to type in search terms has really been the highlight of my week for months now. I love it WOOF!
testimonials.name: Ferry Fahny
